TopicTitle: Career Mode Missions with Liquid Fuel Contract Requirements

Articles.Content: Maybe rework the missions that require building a space station or base with x amount of liquid fuel to be a similar mass of liquid fuel and oxidizer to make it worth having.

Well to be fair, no one is stopping you from sending Oxidizer up with said fuel.

Plus plain old Liquid fuel is good for nukes.
I always bring the oxidizer as well. Makes for some heavy ships.
